string  nick,
string  reason 
)

Someone was disconnected from the server via a Kill.

Parameters:
user Which Operator send teh Kill command
nick Who was Killed.
reason Why the nick was disconnected.
See also:
Listener.OnKill
delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Special.LinksEventHandler ( string  mask,
string  hostname,
int  hopCount,
string  serverInfo,
bool  done 
)

The response to a Sender.Links request.

Parameters:
mask The hostname as it appears in IRC queries.
hostname The actual hostname.
hopCount The number of hops from this server to the target server.
serverInfo Information about the server, usually the network name.
done True if this is the last message in the series. If it is the last it will not contain any server information.
See also:
Listener.OnLinks

bool  done

The response to a Sender.Stats request.

Parameters:

Parameters:
